title: 1971–74 French nuclear tests
text: France carried out a series of 24 <a href="nuclear%20test">nuclear test</a>s from 1971–1974 These tests followed the <a href="1966%E2%80%9370%20French%20nuclear%20tests">1966–70 French nuclear tests</a> series and preceded the <a href="1975%E2%80%9378%20French%20nuclear%20tests">1975–78 French nuclear tests</a>.
